item.title: CVE-2024-33694|2024-04-26T12:43:50.951Z -- Meks -- Meks ThemeForest Smart Widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Meks Meks ThemeForest Smart Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Meks ThemeForest Smart Widget: from n/a through 1.5.
